welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Jesus Maria, Argentina! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of our city, known for its rich cultural heritage and delicious traditional cuisine. We hope you have an unforgettable time exploring and enjoying all that Jesus Maria has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at La Cumbre Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at La Cumbre Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pajas Blancas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pajas Blancas Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
